section.title: Requirements
section.par: To use this module you need the following software packages:

olist.item: To make use of the generated Oracle functions, you need an Oracle installation;
To create the Oracle functions from Python you need one of the Python extension modules for Oracle. You can either use cx_Oracle or DCOracle2.

section.title: Installation
section.par: distutils is used for installation, so it's rather simple. Execute the following command:

This will copy toxic.py to the site-packages directory as part of the ll package. distutils might complain about a missing __init__.py, but you can ignore this: The package init file is provided by ll-core.
For Windows a binary distribution is provided. To install it, double click it and follow the instructions.
If you have difficulties installing this software, send a problem report to Walter Dörwald (walter@livinglogic.de).
